section.title: Automatic Validation
section.p: includes built-in validation engine for YAML documents to help you keep them well-formed. YAML documents are validated automatically as you type and the validation engine detects syntax errors (such as improper indentation or duplicate keys), based upon the YAML specification. The built-in validation also works on files that consist of multiple YAML documents.

section.title: Batch Validation
section.p: The built-in validation engine can also be used to batch validation multiple YAML documents at once. This can be done by selecting multiple YAML documents in the Project Project Explorer view, right-click, and select Validate Check Well-Formedness or Validate Validate . This will automatically validate the selected documents using the built-in YAML validation engine, based upon the YAML specification.
